name: Fullscreen Turntable.fm
description:
Forces fullscreen on turntable.fm.

Current Version: 1.7

Thanks to .sj. for the contributions!
additional_info:
Version 1.7 - Hid the guest list, fixing a few other issues

Version 1.3 - Changed the songboard font to something that displays accented characters better.
Version 1.2 - Added some padding to the input box.
